title: Mobile/fixed market share of Vodafone in its main markets 2018

According to a survey of share Vodafone developers , 0 % of non-gaming ad its were generated through South_Africa/Africa_(Vodacom_Group) .
gold: The statistic depicts the market share of Vodafone in its main markets of operation in 2018.
In that year , Vodafone held a 21.3 percent share of the mobile market in the United Kingdom , while in South Africa the company held 46.3 percent of the market.

Since 2010 , Vodafone 's share of the mobile market in these countries has not substantially changed , however , the brand value of the telecommunications company has decreased in recent years from 29.61 billion U.S. dollars in 2014 to an estimated 21.83 billion in 2017 .
